item.title: YouTube Video and Thumbnail Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled YouTube video and thumbnail editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging and professional video content for our YouTube channel. Responsibilities include editing raw footage, adding effects and transitions, and creating eye-catching thumbnails. The successful candidate will have a strong eye for detail, excellent time management skills, and a creative mindset.

    Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong understanding of YouTube best practices and trends
    - Knowledge of graphic design principles for creating thumbnails
    - Ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines
    - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

    This is a medium-sized project that requires a commitment of 1 to 3 months. The workload will vary depending on the number of videos produced each month. We are looking for an intermediate level editor who can work independently and deliver high-quality videos consistently. If you are passionate about YouTube and have a knack for creating visually appealing content, we'd love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 17:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Education, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Optimise Social Media Video using AI voices - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I'm looking for someone with experience using Descript or other video/audio editing tools.

I have videos where the voice and transition requires optimization since the audio is AI geenrated. Videos are usually 90s long with cut every 10s.

The purpose of the videos is to be posted on Instagram and Tiktok.

Please share any previous work. I'm looking to hire full time if this works well.

item.title: Simple Video for youtube - Upwork
item.description:
Project Requirements:

Concept Development: Collaborate with our team to develop a compelling video concept that aligns with our brand and objectives.
Scripting: No need for script since we provide the script so you build the video based on it .

What We're Looking For:

Creativity: Ability to develop innovative and engaging video content.
Technical Skills: Proficiency in video production and editing, including the use of editing software and camera equipment.
Storytelling: Strong storytelling abilities to create compelling and coherent narratives.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail in all aspects of video production and editing.
Portfolio: A portfolio showcasing previous video projects and demonstrating your skills and creativity.
Project Deliverables:


How to Apply:
Please submit your application with the following:

Portfolio: A link to your portfolio showcasing your previous video work.
Project Proposal: A brief proposal outlining your approach to this project, including an estimated timeline and budget.


If selected could lead to full time job.

Budget: $10

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor Wanted! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a passionate and experienced video editor with a keen eye for detail? Do you want to collaborate on growing a YouTube channel and constantly strive for improvement? Then we are looking for you!

What We Are Looking For:

Experience: You have proven experience in editing YouTube videos.

Availability: You can deliver a minimum of 7 videos per week, each 15+ minutes long.

Quality: You are always seeking ways to improve your work and analyze video performance to see what works well and what can be improved.

Send us your portfolio and provide your rate per 15+ minute video. We would also like to know if you are willing to create a short sample video to see if we are a good match.

Apply Now!
If you meet the above requirements and are excited to be part of our team, please respond to this job post. We look forward to seeing your response and portfolio!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Create UGC Video for $5 and Free Product - Upwork
item.description:
We need someone who's super creative and can make awesome videos using content from our users. It's an easy gig - just make a quick video showing off our product and we'll give you $5 and a free product.  
It's a hairstyling powder that instantly gives volume and lifts the roots.

For the UGC video you can do an umboxing or show how to apply the product, or you can also highlight some of these features:

1- Volumizing Boost: Adds instant volume to hair.
2- Matte Finish: Controls oil and shine for a natural look.
3- Strong Hold: Keeps hairstyles in place all day.
4- Lightweight: Doesn't weigh hair down.
5- Easy Application: Simple to use for quick styling.
6- Residue-Free: Leaves no chalky buildup.
7- Ideal for Fine Hair: Adds texture without heaviness.
8- Fragrance-Free: No overpowering scents.
9- Transparent Bottle: Easily monitor powder levels.
10- Vegan-Friendly: Contains no animal-derived ingredients.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:53 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Explainer Video, Videography
Country: Argentina
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content Manager / Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to assist with our social media engagement and creative process for our own companies and clients.
Our need is for consistent engagement and creating posts as well as working closely with the team to develop posts, reels and stories for 3+ posts a day using a scheduler on several platforms.

I don't want cookie-cutter approach but a solution to being active on social in our clients voice, being authentic and we also have a system with AI that we can train to support in content development. The system we use is straight forward, clean, stand out.

If you are a video editor for YouTube and Social Reels also, even better. We are seeking one of those too.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00

Category: Social Media Marketing

item.title: Photographer/Videographer Needed in Reykjavík for RV Content - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Indie Campers, a leading road trip provider across Europe, North America, and Oceania, is looking for a skilled photographer/videographer to create compelling visual content for our new models Jogger & Duster.

Project Overview:

- Instructional Videos: Detailed guides on how to use all features inside the vehicles. Example: https://youtu.be/AWSsiQ9HwQU
- Demo Videos: Inspirational lifestyle content showcasing the features and experience. Example: https://youtu.be/GTZ3X6zqDZ8
- Lifestyle Photo Shoots: Captivating images of the RVs in natural settings. Example: https://indiecampers.com/rvs/atlas-5

Locations:

- Instructional Videos: Reykjavík Depot.
- Lifestyle Content: Scenic natural spots around Reykjavík

Responsibilities:

-Logistics: Managing all logistics of the shoot, including picking up the van at the depot, finding and securing shooting locations, purchasing necessary props, and creating the right ambience for each shoot.
- Production: Shooting all required video footage and photographs.
- Editing: Including provided motion graphics and transcripts.
- Delivery: Final edited videos and photos ready for use.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in videography and photography, with a strong portfolio.
- Ability to deliver high-quality videos and photos that align with Indie Campers’ brand.
- Proficiency in video and photo editing software.
- Availability to shoot on location in Denver and surroundings during the specified week.

Timeline: Please confirm availability for the month of July 2024.

If you are a creative professional who can bring our RVs to life through visuals, we want to hear from you. Please provide examples of your relevant work and your rate.

Kind regards,

Maria I Indie Campers

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:29 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Production, Videography, Video Editing, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing
Country: Portugal
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Capturing Progress of Homes Under Construction - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create a professional video which showcases a home as we walk through it during construction from beginning to end. The project will involve using our numerous small video clips and photos taken from the beginning to the end of each construction project and putting them all together. The final video should effectively capture the development and transformation of each property.

Duration: Long Term.  We are a small custom home builder.  We build about 8 estate homes a year and we will take video and photos of every home during construction.  At the end, we want to produce a short video of the construction process of each home
Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada

item.title: On-Camera Talent for Tech Education Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an on-camera personality to assist with creating engaging tech walkthroughs and videos on tech trends and education. The ideal candidate should have a camera/mic setup and feel comfortable being on-camera. This role will involve explaining and demonstrating various tech concepts, products, and trends to our audience. We will provide scripts, but comfort ad-libbing is a plus! The videos will be used for educational purposes and to provide insights into the latest tech advancements.

    Skills:
    - Strong on-camera presence
    - Excellent communication skills
    - Knowledgeable about current tech trends and developments
    - Ability to simplify complex concepts
    - Experience in creating engaging and informative videos

    If you are passionate about technology and have the ability to captivate an audience, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us educate and entertain through tech walkthroughs and videos!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:19 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Explainer Video, Education

item.title: Video Editor for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to join our team and help create engaging and compelling videos for our social media platforms. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage into polished videos that align with our brand's guidelines and objectives. You should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to bring creative ideas to the table. The ideal candidate will have experience with various video editing software and a solid portfolio showcasing their previous work.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and assemble raw footage into high-quality videos
  - Collaborate with the content team to understand the project requirements
  - Ensure videos are delivered on time and meet the brand's standards
  - Make necessary adjustments and revisions based on feedback

  Skills:
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar
  - Strong understanding of storytelling and visual communication
  - Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously
  - Knowledge of social media trends and best practices for video content

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level Video Editor who can bring creativity and technical skills to the table.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 16:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply
